item.description:
This is a no-pressure "getting to know you" social meeting, so people can check each other out, network, connect, or just hang and socialize with other artsy, creative, and naturist types.

If you are an artist (or wanna be artist), feel free to bring your works and ideas so others have an indication of what you're doing or would like to do. If you are a model (or wanna be model), feel free to bring your work and ideas for the same reasons. If you are a naturist, you may come to connect with others of mutual interest.

Au Bon Pain is located on the street level of the Christian Science apartment building on Mass. Ave, on the same side of and a short distance from Symphony Hall. It is easily accessible from the Mass Ave stop of the Orange Line, closer to the Symphony stop on th E car but walkable from the Hynes stop of the Green Lines, and also from the #1 Mass Ave/Harvard Sq. bus route.
item.how_to_find_us: I will place a 'Meetup' sign on a table so folks know where to gather.
item.name: Meet And Greet And Connect On Prisidents Day
